docs.abstract: New York Jets sign running back Chris Johnson, adding speed to their backfield, and New York Giants pick up Josh Freeman to back up Eli Manning at quarterback.

docs.snippet: Players at Minnesota State, Mankato, refused to practice for their former coach, who was reinstated by an arbitrator....
docs.lead_paragraph: Players at Minnesota State, Mankato, refused to practice for their former coach, who was reinstated by an arbitrator.
docs.abstract: Minnesota State football players refuse to practice for their former coach Todd Hoffner, who returned to campus after arbitrator ruled he was unfairly fired in wake of child pornography investigation that ultimately cleared him.

docs.snippet: Students, professors and athletes are split on whether a union should be formed by the football team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Students, professors and athletes are split on whether a union should be formed by the football team.
docs.abstract: Students, professors and athletes at Northwestern are split on whether a union should be formed by university's football team; union's supporters say they are seeking expanded medical coverage and want to be sure that athletic scholarships line up with how much it actually costs to attend college; scholarship players will vote on issue April 25.

headline.main: Fault Lines Appear at Northwestern Over Union Vote
headline.print_headline: Fault Lines Appear at Northwestern Over Union Vote

docs.snippet: Soccer, particularly England’s Premier League, is being adopted by the creative circles in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Soccer, particularly England’s Premier League, is being adopted by the creative circles in the United States.
docs.abstract: Soccer, once largely ignored in America, is fast becoming favorite sport of creative types who are attracted by its aesthetic, Europhilic allure and fashionable otherness.

headline.seo: Soccer, Particularly England’s Premier League, Growing in Popularity in New York Creative Circles
